author: kfogel
msg: * STATUS: Move r12286 into approved changes section.  Since it's a doc
change only, two votes is enough.

author: maxb
msg: Miscellaneous mailer.py cleanups.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py (main): Do not test 'author' in the
commit case, since it will always be None.
(OutputBase): Bind the StandardOutput and MailedOutput classes under a
common abstract base class. Abstract the subject-prefixing code here.
(StandardOutput, MailedOutput): Derive from OutputBase.
(MailedOutput.mail_headers): Subject line creation moved out to base class.
(StandardOutput.start, SMTPOutput.start, PipeOutput.start): Remove the
inconsistently applied and never used '**args' parameter.
(StandardOutput.start): Print the "Subject" line, even though we are not
sending email, as it contains useful summary information.
(Messenger.__init__, Messenger.determine_output): Inline determine_output at
its only callsite, __init__.
(Commit.__init__, PropChange.__init__): Remove incorrect fixme comment.
(PropChange.__init__): Remove redundant assignment.
(Config.is_set): Remove unused variable 'parts'.
(initialization code): Don't initialize 'action' with a meaningful-looking
value - 'M' - when in fact the default will never be used, and the
initialization is simply a declaration of the variable. Clarify that some
variables are for propchanges only.
(TODO comments): Remove those items marked [DONE].

author: gradha
msg: Book Spanish. Updated RULES task. Added aspell integration task.

author: maxb
msg: Python bindings: Restore svn.repos.RevisionChangeCollector compatibility with
1.1.x and earlier bindings.
* subversion/bindings/swig/python/svn/repos.py
(ChangeCollector): Document the version in which this class became available.
(ChangeCollector.__init__): Remove compatibility code no longer required.
(RevisionChangeCollector): Expand from a trivial alias for ChangeCollector to
a derived class which alters the behaviour to maintain compatibility with
1.1.x and earlier bindings.

msg: Book Spanish. Some spell checking performed for the Spanish
